verses.verse: And I turned <S%H7725><s%>, and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and looked <S%H7200><s%>, and, behold, there came <S%H3318><s%> four <S%H702><s%> chariots <S%H4818><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> from between two <S%H8147><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%>; and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were mountains <S%H2022><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>.
In the first <S%H7223><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> were red <S%H122><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%>; and in the second <S%H8145><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> black <S%H7838><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%>;

And in the third <S%H7992><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> white <S%H3836><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%>; and in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> grisled <S%H1261><s%> and bay <S%H554><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%>. bay: or, strong
Then I answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, What are these, my lord <S%H113><s%>?

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto me, These are the four <S%H702><s%> spirits <S%H7307><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, which go forth <S%H3318><s%> from standing <S%H3320><s%> before the Lord <S%H113><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>. spirits: or, winds

The black <S%H7838><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> which are therein go forth <S%H3318><s%> into the north <S%H6828><s%> country <S%H776><s%>; and the white <S%H3836><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; and the grisled <S%H1261><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> toward the south <S%H8486><s%> country <S%H776><s%>.

And the bay <S%H554><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%>, and sought <S%H1245><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> that they might walk to and fro <S%H1980><s%> through the earth <S%H776><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%>, Get you hence <S%H3212><s%>, walk to and fro <S%H1980><s%> through the earth <S%H776><s%>. So they walked to and fro <S%H1980><s%> through the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Then cried <S%H2199><s%> he upon <S%H853><s%> me, and spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H7200><s%>, these that go <S%H3318><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%> country <S%H776><s%> have quieted <S%H5117><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> in the north <S%H6828><s%> country <S%H776><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> of them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%>, even of Heldai <S%H2469><s%>, of Tobijah <S%H2900><s%>, and of Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>, which are come <S%H935><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> thou the same day <S%H3117><s%>, and go <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zephaniah <S%H6846><s%>;

Then take <S%H3947><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> crowns <S%H5850><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> them upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech <S%H3087><s%>, the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>;

And speak <S%H559><s%> unto him, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus speaketh <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold the man <S%H376><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> is The BRANCH <S%H6780><s%>; and he shall grow up <S%H6779><s%> out of his place, and he shall build <S%H1129><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: grow: or, branch up from under him

Even he shall build <S%H1129><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and he shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the glory <S%H1935><s%>, and shall sit <S%H3427><s%> and rule <S%H4910><s%> upon his throne <S%H3678><s%>; and he shall be a priest <S%H3548><s%> upon his throne <S%H3678><s%>: and the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> shall be between them both <S%H8147><s%>.

And the crowns <S%H5850><s%> shall be to Helem <S%H2494><s%>, and to Tobijah <S%H2900><s%>, and to Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>, and to Hen <S%H2581><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zephaniah <S%H6846><s%>, for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> in the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And they that are far off <S%H7350><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> in the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto you. And this shall come to pass, if ye will diligently <S%H8085><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
